com.vmlab.main

Class VirtualizationLab

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmlab.main.VirtualizationLab

  • public class VirtualizationLab
extends java.lang.Object

    VirtualizationLab

    Virtualization lab creates the VMs, collects and prints the underutilized VMs and gracefully shuts down all the VMs created

      • runLab

        public java.util.List<com.vmlab.common.data.VmUtilizationData> runLab(java.lang.Integer numberOfVms,
                                                             java.lang.Long programTimeout,
                                                             java.lang.Double cpuUtilizationThreshold,
                                                             java.lang.Double memoryUtilizationThreshold,
                                                             java.lang.Double diskUtilizationThreshold)
        Parameters:
        numberOfVms - Number of VMs
        programTimeout - Amount of time (In seconds) you want the program to run
        cpuUtilizationThreshold - CPU Utilization Threshold
        memoryUtilizationThreshold - Memory Utilization Threshold
        diskUtilizationThreshold - Disk Utilization Threshold
        Returns:
        Returns list of under-utilized VMs as list of VmUtilizationData
